issue.title: Bounding the output function from PySR
issue.body:
Although I am successfully getting a function for our data - as expected - is there any way I could get an inequality for our data as an output of PySR, as well? Meaning, is there anyway I could bound the data â€¦? E.g. if expected value calculated is <X, then satisfied, otherwise, not.


Best,
Khansolo9

P.S. thoroughly enjoy using this software!
